FuncDef:
The esi dynamic-name command configures a dynamic ESI instance with a specific name.
The undo esi dynamic-name command deletes a dynamic ESI instance.
By default, no dynamic ESI instance is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a dynamic ESI instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters starting with a letter, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo: After a dynamic ESI instance is created, you need to run the esi dynamic command to bind the dynamic ESI instance to an Eth-Trunk interface on the access side.
